    • Method Detail

      • addAchievementTier

        public void addAchievementTier(Map<String,Object> params,
                      ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Adds a tier to an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement is created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/tier/add

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.achievementId
          the achievement id for adding a new tier
        • SirqulKeys.iconFilePath
          the achievement tier icon image file path
        • SirqulKeys.title
          the title of the achievement tier
        • SirqulKeys.description
          the description of the achievement tier
        • SirqulKeys.goalCount
          the count requirement for completing the achievement tier

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AchievementObject.addAchievementTier

      • addOrUpdateAchievement

        public void addOrUpdateAchievement(Map<String,Object> params,
                          ISirqulCallback<AchievementShortResponse> callback)
        Create or update an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement is created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key the achievement is for
        • SirqulKeys.achievementId
          the achievement ID for updating an existing achievement, leave empty for creating a new achievement
        • SirqulKeys.analyticsTag
          the analytics tag that will trigger when a user's achievement count gets updated
        • SirqulKeys.title
          the title of the achievement (255 character limit)
        • SirqulKeys.description
          the description of the achievement
        • SirqulKeys.rankType
          the rank type for updating leader boards
        • SirqulKeys.rankIncrement
          determines how much the rank count is incremented
        • SirqulKeys.validate
          determines whether to the customId on analytics are

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a AchievementShortResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AchievementObject.addOrUpdateAchievement

      • getAchievement

        public void getAchievement(Map<String,Object> params,
                  ISirqulCallback<AchievementResponse> callback)
        Get detailed information about an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement was created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/get

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.achievementId
          the achievement ID

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a AchievementResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AchievementObject.getAchievement

      • getAchievements

        public void getAchievements(Map<String,Object> params,
                   ISirqulCallback<ListResponse<AchievementProgressResponse>> callback)
        Gets a list of of user achievements.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/achievement/get

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user
        • SirqulKeys.connectionAccountEmail
          the email of the account to view achievements
        • SirqulKeys.connectionAccountId
          the id of the account to view achievements
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key for filtering results by application
        • SirqulKeys.includeUndiscovered
          determines whether to return achievements that the user has not discovered yet
        • SirqulKeys.location of type Location
          the current location of the user

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        ListResponse<AchievementProgressResponse> on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message.
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AchievementObject.getAchievements

      • removeAchievement

        public void removeAchievement(Map<String,Object> params,
                     ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Deletes an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement was created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/delete

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user
        • SirqulKeys.achievementId
          the achievement id for deletion

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AchievementObject.removeAchievement

      • searchAchievements

        public void searchAchievements(Map<String,Object> params,
                      ISirqulCallback<SearchResponse<AchievementShortResponse>> callback)
        Searches achievements by application.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/search

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.appKey of type String
          the application key
        • SirqulKeys.sortField
          the field to sort by. See Enums.AchievementApiMap
        • SirqulKeys.descending
          determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        • SirqulKeys.start
          the start index for pagination
        • SirqulKeys.limit
          the limit for pagination
        • SirqulKeys.activeOnly
          Filter results to only return active employees

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SearchResponse<AchievementShortResponse> on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AchievementObject.searchAchievements

      • updateAchievementTier

        public void updateAchievementTier(Map<String,Object> params,
                         ISirqulCallback<SirqulResponse> callback)
        Updates a tier of an achievement (for developer/retailer use). User must have permissions to the application the achievement is created for.

        Target API Endpoint: /achievement/tier/update

        Available parameters for this api
        • SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
          the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        • SirqulKeys.achievementTierId
          the achievement tier id for updating
        • SirqulKeys.iconFilePath
          achievement tier icon image file path
        • SirqulKeys.title
          the title of the achievement tier
        • SirqulKeys.description
          the description of the achievement tier
        • SirqulKeys.goalCount
          the count requirement for completing the achievement tier

        SirqulResponse subclass type:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Parameters:
        params - the Map<String, Object> containing the parameters, both required and any optional ones you wish to send through to this api.
        callback - the callback
        See Also:
        AchievementObject.updateAchievementTier
